name: Carolina Zarate
code:
# prompt: Create a Python code to draw a  beach scene with a palm tree, a person enjoying the peaceful view and the sun.

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Crear la figura y los ejes
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

# Fondo del cielo
ax.fill_between([-10, 10], 0, 10, color='#ADD8E6')  # Azul claro

# Arena de la playa
ax.fill_between([-10, 10], -1, 0, color='burlywood')  # Color arena

# Océano
ax.fill_between([-10, 10], -2, -1, color='deepskyblue')  # Azul océano


# Sol
circle = plt.Circle((5, 8), 1, color='yellow')
ax.add_patch(circle)


# Palma
ax.plot([2, 2], [-0.5, 2], color='brown', linewidth=3)  # Tronco
ax.plot([1.5, 2.5], [2, 2.5], color='darkgreen', linewidth=5)  # Hojas
ax.plot([1, 2.8], [2.2, 3], color='darkgreen', linewidth=5)
ax.plot([1.5, 3], [2.5, 2.8], color='darkgreen', linewidth=5)

# Persona
circle = plt.Circle((7, -0.5), 0.3, color='tan') #color piel
ax.add_patch(circle)
ax.plot([7, 7], [-0.5, -1], color='black', linewidth=2)  # Piernas

# Nubes
for i in range(2, 9, 2):
    circle = plt.Circle((i, 8), 1, color='white')
    ax.add_patch(circle)


# Eliminar ejes
ax.axis('off')

# Mostrar el paisaje
plt.show()
